pli-tv-bu-vb-pc34:1.2.3: “Flour products” renders sattu. See discussion in the Appendix of Technical Terms.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc34:2.1.6: “Cookies” renders pūva. See discussion in the Appendix of Technical Terms.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc34:2.1.8: “Crackers” renders mantha. See discussion in the Appendix of Technical Terms.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc34:2.1.20: That is, the one who is told commits the offense.
